name: Sophie Koonin (@sophie@social.lol)
summary: What really fucks me off is that there are protests against this blocking the bill rubbish but I’m now too scared to protest in case I get arrested, because I’d lose my job at the bank. But that’s exactly what the govt wanted isn’t it. I wasn’t planning on doing anything illegal but given that someone literally got arrested for a placard that said “fuck imperialism, abolish monarchy” I don’t even know what’s “allowed” any more
